text:
Cool stuff! :+1:

I am a big fan of reactivity in JavaScript. A long time ago I played with MobX (I see it is one of your's inspirations) and really enjoyed it. Now I am on the Vue side, and one of the reason I use Vue is its really nice reactive system (which similar to MobX) and especially the new Composition API (inspired by React hooks).

So something that is not clear for me: what differences between your library and MobX? And with Vue?
